attributes.action: Declare the Sino-British Joint Declaration Null and Void
attributes.additional_details:
The Sino-British Joint Declaration states that Hong Kong SAR will "enjoy a high degree of autonomy". Multiple events and news coverage over recent years has cast a shadow of doubt of whether this is truly the case in Hong Kong. The Chinese government has even stated that the Joint Declaration is a "historical document" that no longer applies.

Chinese government meddling in Hong Kong affairs: http://j.mp/2LnALFp
attributes.background: Given the recent events in Hong Kong with clear evidence of interference from the Chinese government in local affairs, we are no longer confident that the Sino-British Joint Declaration is being upheld by China. The UK Government must immediately declare the Joint Declaration null and void.
